body.bibl: Ben-Shammai, Haggai, Efrat Batat, Sagit Butbul, David Sklare, and Sarah Stroumsa. Judaeo-Arabic manuscripts in the Firkovitch Collections. Yefet ben ʿEli al-Basri, Commentary on Genesis. Center for the Study of Judaeo-Arabic Culture and Literature. Publications. Jerusalem: Ben-Zvi Institute, Center for the Study of Judaeo-Arabic Culture and Literature, 2000.
